page.title: 19CLYDESDALE STEELWORKS
page.content: {Clydesdale Steelworks}is owned by {British Steel.} People here in Motherwell are worried that the giant Ravenscraig steelworks nearby, which employs about 4000 people might not have a long term future. Many local companies have already closed. Clydesdale Steelworks which employs {2500 workers}is not dependant on Ravenscraig since it makes its own steel{(300,000 tonnes per annum)}which is then made into tubes{( 200,000 {tonnes per annum).}The main customers for the tubes are the oil companies so Clydesdale should be safe while there is oil drilling in the North Sea.
